title: Learning Counterfactual Explanations for Recommender Systems
details: O Barkan, V Bogina, L Gurevitch, Y Asher… - The Web Conference 2024
abstract: We introduce the Learning to eXplain Recommendations (LXR) framework, a post- hoc, model-agnostic framework for counterfactual explanations of recommender systems. LXR can work with any differentiable recommender and learns to score the …
